titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (PENETRATIVE SEX OPPOSITE SEX PARTNERS FOR THE LAST TIME PERSON HAD SEX) - Description

body.p: CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (PENETRATIVE SEX OPPOSITE SEX PARTNERS FOR THE LAST TIME PERSON HAD SEX) is the same as attribute CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR . CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (PENETRATIVE SEX OPPOSITE SEX PARTNERS FOR THE LAST TIME PERSON HAD SEX) is an indication of whether the PERSON had condomless sex the last time they had penetrative sex with an opposite sex partner.
